text: geudaega geudeul-ege gijeog-eul boiji anhneundamyeon geudaeneun wae geugeos eul kkumyeonaeji anhneunyo lago geudeul-eun malhal geos-ila illeogalodoe naneun na ui junimkkeseo naege gyesihan geos-eul ttaleul geos-ila igeos-i mid-eum-eul gajinja leul wihae junim-eulobuteo naelyeojin bich iyo bog-eum-iyo eunhyela
